column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We also got the short rib with mashed potatoes
column4: and spicy potatoes. The short was incredible... it melted in your mouth and had wonderful flavors. It tasted like the pot roast that you wished your mom made. The sirloin was very good
column5: and I was surprised at the good hunk of meat you get for $8. I was excited for the dates after reading reviews
column6: but I wasn't as impressed. Bacon = yum
column7: but the dates were so sugary. It tasted like candy wrapped in bacon. It was good and I see how other people love it
column8: but I prefer more savory flavors. The potatoes were good
column9: golden brown with just a bit of spice and come with a creamy tomato aioli for dipping.
